/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.3.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/OpenGLArrowPointer.dir/main.cpp.o -o OpenGLArrowPointer -F/Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX12.sdk/System/Library/Frameworks  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/lib -Xlinker -framework -Xlinker OpenGL -Xlinker -framework -Xlinker OpenGL /opt/homebrew/lib/libGLEW.2.2.0.dylib /opt/homebrew/lib/libglfw.3.4.dylib -Xlinker -framework -Xlinker OpenGL
